name: Chital III Table Lamp
description: The Chital III Table Lamp by Kifu Paris is a sleek and sculptural piece, inlaid in a mixture of bronze-patina brass with shagreen or shell inlay. The chiseled legs, which are an iconic shape within the KIFU PARIS universe, morph into the solid shades that create a modern-vintage feel. This piece is designed by Kifu Augousti, the daughter of Ria and Yiouri Augousti. All shagreen pieces are hand-dyed by artisans. Available as a floor lamp. Custom color/sizing is available on request. Made to order 8-10 weeks. Wipe clean with a soft dry cloth. Inspired by her parents, Kifu’s collection has its own distinct identity, using handmade techniques with shagreen, shells, semi-precious stones, reflecting her youthful, quirky style.
